\subsection*{Additional Inherited Members}


\subsection{Detailed Description}
An abstraction of an Open\+GL framebuffer.

This does not follow Open\+GL\textquotesingle{}s A\+PI as closely, but is a cleaner interface \mbox{\Hypertarget{classrev_1_1_frame_buffer_a03d7ca6784c7b4d277c47c29f81f631a}\label{classrev_1_1_frame_buffer_a03d7ca6784c7b4d277c47c29f81f631a}}

blit with another framebuffer 

This follows Open\+GL\textquotesingle{}s A\+PI closely, so the framebuffers bound to G\+L\+\_\+\+R\+E\+A\+D\+\_\+\+F\+R\+A\+M\+E\+B\+U\+F\+F\+ER and G\+L\+\_\+\+W\+R\+I\+T\+E\+\_\+\+F\+R\+A\+M\+E\+B\+U\+F\+F\+ER are used \mbox{\Hypertarget{classrev_1_1_frame_buffer_ab6415b100449eb4c2332a5a3e9f93d26}\label{classrev_1_1_frame_buffer_ab6415b100449eb4c2332a5a3e9f93d26}}
